resources.string: This app is made for users who might be interested in geography or countries, and wants to learn more about unusual and interesting places on earth. The user is someone in any age from youth to adult and does not need to have any prior knowledge in this subject to understand the contents of the application. \n\nThe app provides information about remote islands and also where the user can read more about them. Some english understanding is required by the user since the information provided and the external wikipedia pages are written in english.
